desc.Description: As the sole developer I owned discovery work with users & stakeholders, designed, developed, and delivered the Kidogo Mobile App prototype; a childcare Swiss army knife. The app offers digital and automated solutions for enrollment, payments, attendance, and finance tracking.
desc.Architecture: Limited funds and rapidly growing clientele necessitated an affordable, scalable solution. The Kidogo app is a serverless, offline-first React Native app. When users have access to wifi they send data via HTTP request, triggering a Node/Express Lambda, and persisting data through DynamoDB ensuring Kidogo only pays for what it uses.
desc.Impact: The prototype is currently being user tested by 30 participants across multiple childcare centers in Kenya. Development continues after the rigorous onboarding I provided to new freelance developers to support continuous integration and development.

desc.Description: A digital kiosk that allows customers to find products, amenities, and restaurants in one of North America's top high-end retailers flagship stores.
desc.Architecture: The Electron-based desktop app for 55-inch touchscreen display features a React app that synthesizes data from a Java product information API and caches data via Redis. Extensive metrics and analytics from Datadog, Splunk, and ClickStream provide a granular insight into exactly how users interface with the solution.
desc.Impact: 16 units across two stores have provide a delightful experience across an average of 3,000 monthly sessions per device. Cutting-edge React technology provides an exception-safe experience and a powerful insight into customer behavior provides uniquely valuable data.

desc.Description: is displayed on a mounted iPad - allowing customers to request help, alterations, or other services from sales associates without ever having to leave the comfor of their dressing room.
desc.Architecture: A React Native iOS app serves as a light-weight UI sending user input via HTTP request to an integrated voice service.  Staff can hear incoming requests for help and answer calls for assistance instantly from a headset.
desc.Impact: Customers in 12 retail stores across North America have gained a sense of control of their shopping experience; summoning help with the press of a button.

desc.Description: A web app serves as a central hub to view department-specific data on which employees are assisting different fitting rooms.
desc.Architecture: The React app gathers employee data from an internal API, determines which employees have currently punched in for a shift, and allows them to be paired with fitting rooms. When a pairing occurs employees are notified by headset instnatly via an integrated voice service
desc.Impact: Employees in 12 retail stores across North America can quickly dispatch sales associates to assist customers in dressing rooms.
